verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> there come <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,

Why <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G3845><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they eat <S%G2068><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G1223><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G3845><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> said <S%G1781><s%>, Honor <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, He that speaketh evil <S%G2551><s%> of father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, let him die <S%G5053><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>, whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G302><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G3962><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%>, That <S%G3739><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> thou mightest have been profited <S%G5623><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> is given to God <S%G1435><s%>;

he shall <S%G3361><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> honor <S%G5091><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> ye have made void <S%G208><s%> the word of God <S%G2316><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>.
Ye hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>, well <S%G2573><s%> did <S%G4395><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,

This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> honoreth <S%G5091><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> with <S%G4750><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lips <S%G4750><s%>; But <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, Teaching <S%G1321><s%> as their doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the precepts <S%G1778><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> to him the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%>:

Not <S%G3756><s%> that which entereth <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that which proceedeth out <S%G1607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%>, this <S%G5124><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Knowest thou <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were offended <S%G4624><s%>, when they heard <S%G191><s%> this saying <S%G3056><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Every <S%G3956><s%> plant <S%G5451><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, shall be rooted up <S%G1610><s%>.

Let <S%G863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> alone <S%G863><s%>: they are <S%G1526><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> guides <S%G3595><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> guide <S%G3594><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%>, both <S%G297><s%> shall fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a pit <S%G999><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Declare <S%G5419><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> even yet <S%G188><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%>?

Perceive <S%G3539><s%> ye <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3768><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> goeth <S%G1531><s%> into the <S%G1519><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> passeth <S%G5562><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the belly <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is cast out <S%G1544><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the draught <S%G856><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> the things which proceed <S%G1607><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> come forth <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%>; and they <S%G2548><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> forth evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%>, murders <S%G5408><s%>, adulteries <S%G3430><s%>, fornications <S%G4202><s%>, thefts <S%G2829><s%>, false witness <S%G5577><s%>, railings <S%G988><s%>:

these <S%G5023><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> the things which defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> with <S%G5495><s%> unwashen <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G402><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the parts of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a Canaanitish <S%G5478><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G575><s%> from <S%G3725><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> borders <S%G3725><s%>, and cried <S%G2905><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>, O Lord <S%G2962><s%>, thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>; my <S%G3450><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> is <S%G1139><s%> grievously <S%G2560><s%> vexed with a demon <S%G1139><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> her <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and besought <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Send <S%G630><s%> her <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> she crieth <S%G2896><s%> after <S%G3693><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, I <S%G649><s%> was <S%G649><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the lost <S%G622><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> of the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> she <S%G2064><s%> came and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, help <S%G997><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%>'s bread <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> it to the dogs <S%G2952><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> she said <S%G2036><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, Lord <S%G2532><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> even the dogs <S%G2952><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the crumbs <S%G5589><s%> which fall <S%G4098><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%>' table <S%G5132><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%>, great <S%G3173><s%> is thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: be it <S%G1096><s%> done unto thee <S%G4671><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> was healed <S%G2390><s%> from <S%G575><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> departed <S%G3327><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> nigh <S%G3844><s%> unto the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sat there <S%G1563><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there came unto <S%G4334><s%> him <S%G846><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G1438><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%>, blind <S%G5185><s%>, dumb <S%G2974><s%>, maimed <S%G2948><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> others <S%G2087><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they cast <S%G4496><s%> them <S%G846><s%> down <S%G4496><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> his <S%G2424><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them <S%G846><s%>:

insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> wondered <S%G2296><s%>, when they saw <S%G991><s%> the dumb <S%G2974><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%>, the maimed <S%G2948><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%>, and lame <S%G5560><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they glorified <S%G1392><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> unto him his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, I have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they continue with <S%G4357><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G5101><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> send <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%> fasting <S%G3523><s%>, lest <S%G3379><s%> haply they faint <S%G1590><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Whence <S%G4159><s%> should we have <S%G2254><s%> so many <S%G5118><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a desert <S%G2047><s%> place as <S%G5620><s%> to fill <S%G5526><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, How many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> have ye <S%G2192><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Seven <S%G2033><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> small fishes <S%G2485><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2753><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G740><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the fishes <S%G2486><s%>; and he gave thanks <S%G2168><s%> and brake <S%G2806><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> ate <S%G5315><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they took up <S%G142><s%> that which remained <S%G4052><s%> over of the broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces <S%G2033><s%>, seven baskets <S%G4711><s%> full <S%G4134><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they that did eat <S%G2068><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> four thousand <S%G5070><s%> men <S%G435><s%>, besides <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> children <S%G3813><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he sent away <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%>, and entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Magadan <S%G3093><s%>.
